name: ContentMode
desc: Constants that define how a view’s content fills the available space.

items.name: case fill
items.desc: An option that resizes the content so it occupies all available space, both vertically and horizontally.

items.name: case fit
items.desc: An option that resizes the content so it’s all within the available space, both vertically and horizontally.

items.name: static var allCases: [ContentMode]
items.desc: A collection of all values of this type.

items.name: typealias AllCases
items.desc: A type that can represent a collection of all values of this type.

items.name: static func == (ContentMode, ContentMode) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two content modes are equal.

items.name: static func != (Self, Self) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two content modes are unequal.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of the content mode by passing them into the given hash function.

items.name: var hashValue: Int
items.desc: The hashed value of the content mode.
